abstract: A strategy announcement by Google is less a shift than a new message — a way for the company to talk about its initiatives in a way shareholders can readily understand.
snippet: A strategy announcement by Google is less a shift than a new message — a way for the company to talk about its initiatives in a way shareholders can readily understand.
lead_paragraph: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., May 10  Over the years, Google has carefully cultivated the image of a zany company in which innovation and new products  lots of new products  emerge from a bit of chaos.

headline.main: Out of Chaos, Order. Or So Google Says.
headline.print_headline: Out of Chaos, Order. Or So Google Says.

abstract: Google, which last month announced a deal to buy online ad firm DoubleClick for $3.1 billion, said that while it has become more comfortable doing big acquisitions, it still sees small technology deals as its primary thrust for buying businesses.
lead_paragraph: Google, which last month announced a deal to buy online ad firm DoubleClick for $3.1 billion, said that while it has become more comfortable doing big acquisitions, it still sees small technology deals as its primary thrust for buying businesses.
